price: 难道你没有看见与安拉所遣怒的民众结交的人吗？他们不属于你们，也不属于那些民众；他们明知故犯地以谎言盟誓。
arabic: ۞ أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوۡاْ قَوۡمًا غَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا هُم مِّنكُمۡ وَلَا مِنۡهُمۡ وَيَحۡلِفُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡكَذِبِ وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna tawallaw qawman ghaḍiba al-lahu ʿalayhim mā hum minkum walā min'hum wayaḥlifūna ʿalā al-kadhibi wahum yaʿlamūna
